verses.roman:
tabe nityānanda prabhu sṛjilā upāya
krame-krame kīrtanīyā rākhila sabāya

synonyms: tabe—at that time; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; prabhu—the Lord; sṛjilā upāya—made a device; krame-krame—by and by; kīrtanīyā—the chanters; rākhila—stopped; sabāya—all.
translation: Then Lord Nityānanda found a way to end the kīrtana. He gradually stopped all the chanters.
